name: Simple chess (itch) (Lex Sheyn)
description:
It's a simple game where you need to take all enemy positions, instead of eating his figures, to achieve the victory. VERY SIMPLE GAME.

Made with C++, SFML and FMOD.

Music by N91.

SFX by Zapsplat.com.

Visuals by ... don't know who.

For now only 1600x900 resolution available.

If you want to support my studies - you can.

I strongly recommend you to look at N91, he is cool guy, awesome music artist. He has never asked me for that, and he doesn't even know who I am, but why not. Want to give him a credit.

If you want my assistance as Game Designer/C++ developer, you are welcome. PM me here or via email.
